item.description:
Characters is now called Champions.  It is on the first (and second?) floors of the Marriott Hotel right above the outbound Kendall/MIT redline station.

Unfortunately MIT needs our usual space tonight for one of their events.  And for those that prefer the scientific equation... MIT > BG, therefore BG = SOL

 

This will not be happening on a regular basis, but it`s happening tonight, and one more time in the next month or so.

 

Sorry for the late notice. Jenni warned me, but I totally flaked.  I apologize

 

Becki
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the boisterous people with games on the table.
item.name: Mid week burnout? come play games!
